timeline.bodyText:
There are some issues with this:


After this change is done, then we have to exclude com.ahome-it:lienzo-core from the lienzo-charts dependency below, otherwise there are duplicated classes.


Even if it is excluded, there is a compilation error when building dashbuilder-app:


Compiling module org.dashbuilder.DashbuilderShowcase
[INFO]    Tracing compile failure path for type 'com.ait.lienzo.charts.client.core.json.validators.PieChartDataValidator'
[INFO]       [ERROR] Errors in 'jar:file:/home/mmacik/.m2/repository/com/ahome-it/lienzo-charts/1.0.241-RC1/lienzo-charts-1.0.241-RC1.jar!/com/ait/lienzo/charts/client/core/json/validators/PieChartDataValidator.java'
[INFO]          [ERROR] Line 34: The type new IAttributeTypeValidator(){} must implement the inherited abstract method IAttributeTypeValidator.getTypeName()
[INFO]          [ERROR] Line 34: The type new IAttributeTypeValidator(){} must implement the inherited abstract method IAttributeTypeValidator.isIgnored()
[INFO]    [ERROR] Aborting compile due to errors in some input files

The root cause is that the lienzo-charts uses an interface from lienzo-core which looks like this. However, the org.kie:lienzo-core has this interface slightly changed to this, so obviously there are methods which are not implemented. @romartin is this ok or should we update it appropriately?
timeline.author: MarianMacik

replies.bodyText: @MarianMacik yes, I started an email thread on this due mismatched of lienzo versions
replies.author: mareknovotny
